phrases: I am late, I am late!
I got to go, I got to go!
I am off!
The Search
Man, what a close call.
I came this close to being late.
Hey, pretty unusual, Chitoge.
Even if it was just barely, for you to get here before me...
Chitoge?!
You lost your ribbon?
I did not notice till I got to school.
Since you were in a hurry, the knot might have been too loose.
So you are not even sure where you might have dropped it?
I am going to go look for it now!
Hold up, hold up!
Class is about to start!
Come on, calm down, will you?
I will help you look for it after school, all right?
But that ribbon...
Yeah, I know.
It is your cherished ribbon that you got from Ms. Hana, right?
I promise you that I will find it.
Well, that is one thing, but...
That is the one that y
Huh?
No, never mind.
Never fear, Young Mistress!
I, too, shall help with the search.
We will pitch in, too.
You guys!
For now, let me tie this up for you.
Thanks.
I thought it would come in handy one day, so...
My hair/makeup kit!
All right, what kind of style should we go for?
Honestly!
Over a ribbon... how pathetic you are!
I cannot imagine that anyone would turn in that strip of cloth.
By now it might well be discarded along with the trash, no?
Marika Tachibana!
Why, you...!
You think so?
You really think that is what happened to it?
Kirisaki!
That is not at all how you would usually react!
I implore you not to sob so hard!
Very well, very well!
I, too, shall lend a hand in the search,
so for goodness sake, please stop crying!
Is she okay?
Chitoge...
I wonder where it could be?
Chitoge's ribbon...
It does not seem like anything resembling it was turned in at the police station.
Are you all right, Young Mistress?
Come on, cheer up, Chitoge.
We will help you look again today.
Yeah...
Man, what am I going to do with you?
All right, today, as a special treat...
I am going to buy you some ramen!
That limited-edition ramen that you love came back on the menu lately, right?
When we find your ribbon, let us all go out for...
No, thanks.
I am not in the mood.
Did she just turn down ramen?
I-I-I mean it is ramen!
She is never done that before, not once!
Dammit, look how meek she is gotten.
It is not a matter of being thrown off...
I just cannot stand to see her like this!
Yeah, but what is this?
Maybe I am imagining things, but somehow...
No.
Normally, it is hard to forget, but she is always been a stunner, right?
Somehow, together with that meekness,
she looks more feminine than usual to me...
Hey, Chitoge!
Want To arm-wrestle with me?
Why?
Never mind why.
Let us go!
Ready... set...
Master Raku!
I was a fool for getting my faint hopes up.
Are you all right?
Master Raku!
Are you okay, Ichijo?
You really are a moron.
Yeah, but if we never do find that ribbon, what is going to happen?
Could it be that she will stay this way forever?
We just cannot seem to find your ribbon, Young Mistress.
Where else can we look for it?
We might have to expand our search area.
Look at her, mired in depression again.
I really cannot take this anymore.
I wish I could somehow cheer her up,
but that ribbon's nowhere to be found.
Thank you very much!
Like Tachibana said, even if someone did pick up that ribbon,
it is doubtful that they would turn it in.
I have no choice.
It is killing me to trick her like this, but...
Hey, Chitoge!
I found it!
I found your ribbon!
Whaaat?
No way!
Did you really?
Where was it?
Oh, well, it got blown away into some alley, see...
Here.
Try not to lose it again!
Oh, wow!
Thank goodness!
Thank you so...
It smells different.
Smell?
You can tell something like that?
It smells like it is brand-new.
Raku?
My bad!
I am sorry I tried to trick you!
But see...
I did not mean you any harm.
No... that is okay.
You did that for me, did not you?
Thanks.
What is up with that?!
The normal you would totally kick my butt, bury me in the ground,
and stomp off, shouting all kinds of abuse!
Who the hell are you, anyway?
But no matter how you look at it, that one's the awful Chitoge, right?
It just might be better for her to stay this way.
No, no!
No way would that be better!
I came this close to being deceived by a gentle lie!
No choice, then.
I will just start all over and look for it...
Is that...?
What is the matter?
Hey, Chitoge.
You have got great eyesight, right?
Over there...
That thing caught in the telephone pole...
Found it!
Found it, found it, found it!
You are not getting away!
Well, I guess I should be glad that you have cheered up.
Oh, crap!
I have lost sight of it!
But I am going to find it, no matter what!
Found it!
I am going to catch it this time for sure!
Hold up!
Not there!
N-No way...
Hey, hey.
What is all this crying for, huh?
Raku...
Because... my ribbon...
No, that is the ribbon that I bought.
My ribbon just got blown away by the wind, too.
You were chasing after the wrong one.
And just now, I picked up your ribbon.
Here.
You can tell by the smell, right?
Go on and make sure.
This is the real deal!
I am relieved!
I am so relieved!
Seriously...
Next time, be sure to...
Thank you!
Thank you!
Why are you glomming onto me, moron?!
I will never lose you again, all right?
Oh, man...
So she is finally back to being her usual self, huh?
It seems just a little too bad.
What is your problem?
No... this feels more natural, after all.
Hey!
Why are you smiling?
Nothing.
Hey, come on!
Just Testing
A LITTLE LOVE HERE!!
Confess...
No, no, no...
Not happening, not happening!
But...
If... If I did...
I wonder what would happen?
As for how I feel about him...
Well...
I like him.
But as for whether or not I want to date him...
To be honest, I am not sure.
What is it that I want to do?
How do I want this to end up?
If I did confess my feelings, would it change anything?
Should I do it?
As a test.
Just as a test?
Not for real.
Just see what it is like to say it.
What is going on?
Staring at me like that...
Impossible!
Absolutely impossible!
Just the thought of confessing my feelings to him makes my head explode!
Because if he turns me down, what am I going to do?
We still have to keep up this fake love afterwards!
No way could I take that!
I would totally die!
But if I really did tell him how I feel, what kind of look would he give me?
Would he be happy?
Would he be disgusted?
I bet he would be disgusted!
After all, he does not even see me as the girlfriend type.
Why are you pondering this so seriously, Chitoge?!
Just testing!
You are only testing out this thought!
No Confession
Cannot Say It...
If I cannot tell him directly, why do not I write him a love letter?
That seems like it would be much easier.
Wait, what am I supposed to write?
I love you, please go out with me!
I guess?
Yeah...
No Way
Cannot Write That
Impossible
It is no good!
I cannot write that!
Even if I know I am not really handing it to him,
it is so embarrassing, I cannot take it!
My heart's pounding harder than I would ever imagined.
Did all the couples in the world get through these rituals to become couples?
Are not they all beyond heroic?
That is it.
No letter!
For now, let me practice.
Um...
Let us see...
You see...
Um...
I love you!
Please go out with me!
I managed to say it.
Although it was horribly embarrassing, I managed to say it.
Well, I guess if I am talking to a doll, it is no...
What are you doing, Young Mistress?
It is not...
That was just me practicing!
Actually, I was just mimicking some TV show!
Anyway, Tsugumi, would you mind knocking?
Knocking!
I did knock, but...
Pardon me.
Confessing your feelings is hard, after all.
This was just practice, and look at me!
If it were for real...
Totally Impossible (>_<)
Impossible
I wonder how everybody else does it?
Hey, Dad.
Who confessed their feelings first, you or Mom?
Hmm, let us see.
Well, long story short, it was me, but...
Come to think of it, I never told you how I met Hana, did I?
Hana and I met when I happened to be here in Japan on business, you see...
It happened one day when we were trading gunshots with an enemy organization
in an abandoned factory...
Looks like the pressure's on us, eh?
What do you want to do, Boss?
W-What is up with that woman?
Who the hell is she?
Is she out of her mind?
Walking right into a hail of bullets...
This woman stood right in the crossfire,
and this is what she said...
Which of you people called in the order for this pizza?
You mean that was Mom?
That is right.
Back then, Hana was a struggling student, you see.
She was juggling seventeen part-time jobs just to get by.
Seventeen?
What is up with that?
At that moment, Hana was so beautiful.
Looking just like an angel who would descended onto a battlefield.
In spite of myself, I was captivated by the sight of her.
So what did you do after that, Dad?
Right...
I proposed.
Will you marry me?
Why would you...?
Immediately afterwards, I got the living daylights kicked out of me.
Mom's something else, huh?
In other words, it was love at first sight for me,
but I had my work cut out for afterwards!
I kept making moves on her, but she would always shoot me down,
and in the worst cases I would end up with broken bones during the rejection.
No good, this is too atypical to be of any help.
But the thing is, despite all that, I could not stand not to tell her how I felt.
That is how alluring she was to me.
I was sure she was the one I was destined to be with.
So Dad was really in love with Mom.
I wonder if I can pull that off just like he did?
It does not seem like I can even pretend to confess my feelings for him, so...
Can I really tell him that I love him?
Hey, Chitoge!
Ahead of you!
Wound
What a child.
Oh, you shut up!
Just leave me alone!
Spacing out and crashing into a sign...
How scatterbrained is that, anyway?
Oh, back off.
Something on your mind?
Lately you have been brooding over something, am I right?
If there is something I can do,
I would not mind being your sounding board.
He is been worried about me...
That kind of makes me happy.
No, no, I am fine.
Is that right?
Right now, we might have the tiniest bit of chemistry.
No, no... is that a reason to confess?
Impossible!
But if you are in love with him, that is what you should do!
If you do it, something might change.
Do you really love him?
This might be your chance!
I do not know!
But...
Now that I think of it...
Since you came to Japan,
and we started pretending to be dating...
It is already been more than a year, huh?
Amazing, huh?
I am used to it now.
The fact that I am used to such an abnormal situation scares me.
What is up with that?
Are you complaining about the status quo?
No, nothing like that.
It just blows my mind, that is all.
So much happened, huh?
Getting clobbered by you, clobbered by you, clobbered by you...
Hey, you!
It was all your fault, you know!
It was mostly beyond my control, remember?
Anyway, how about you?
I mean, you were so pissed about this whole thing...
But of course I would resign myself!
Since I am an adult.
Where is this adult you are talking about?
Cannot you see the lady before your eyes?
Nope, not seeing her!
I am going to clobber you.
Hey, but you do not mind me now, right?
Well, but we still have more than halfway to go before we graduate, you know!
Well, no use thinking about what is going to happen in the future.
Let us just take our time with this.
We will figure it out somehow!
Take our time, huh?
Right.
It is not like I have to do it right this minute!
What are you talking about?
That is private!
That is right...
I want to spend more time with him.
Right now, that is how I feel towards him.
Why do not we head back now?
Yeah.
If my feelings of love for this guy do not change,
then someday I will want to confess to him like my dad did.
If that day ever comes...
Hey, Raku!
Never mind, it is nothing.
What is up with you, anyway?
Actually, it was not nothing.
Shall I treat you to some ramen today?
Me, treat lowly you?
What is the matter with you?
You got a fever or something?
Wh-Why would your mind go there, huh?
Because normally, that would never happen in a million...
Why, you... shut up!
